monsterDetails.exploreAbilityDescription: - Allows the player to swim - Unaffected by water streams
monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: Aura: Whenever another Monster in the party would spend Mana, 25% of the needed Mana is taken from this Monster instead.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: Throughout combat, gain a Charge stack for every 75 Mana spent by any allied Monster.

skills.name: Aeons
skills.description: At the start of the turn, heal 3% of this Monster's Max HP for every Age stack. (Capped at 7 stacks)

skills.name: Aging
skills.description: At the end of its turn, this Monster gains an Age stack.

skills.name: Blood Magic
skills.description: Aura: Whenever an allied Occult or Mage Monster hits an enemy, 35% chance to inflict a Bleed stack equal to 35% of that damage.

skills.name: Bolster
skills.description: Healing actions apply two random Buffs to the target. (Multi-Target-Heals apply one random Buff to each target)

skills.name: Brains over Brawn
skills.description: If this Monster would gain Might (Buff), it gains Sorcery (Buff) instead.

skills.name: Bubble Burst
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) magical damage (water)

skills.name: Bubble Burst Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 45% (225%) magical damage (water)

skills.name: Bubble Burst Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 55% (275%) magical damage (water)

skills.name: Bubble Burst Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 60% (360%) magical damage (water)

skills.name: Bubble Burst Lvl 5
skills.description: 7 x 65% (455%) magical damage (water)

skills.name: Bubble Deluge
skills.description: 2 x 150% (300%) magical damage (water) Hits all enemies Applies Channel (Buff) to whole party Removes 1 Debuff from all allies

skills.name: Crit Damage Plus
skills.description: +15% Critical Damage

skills.name: Critical Consistency
skills.description: +10% Critical Damage. Critical Damage also increases non-Critical hits by 10% of the amount.

skills.name: Critical Defense
skills.description: Reduces damage taken by 10% of own Critical Damage value.

skills.name: Debuff Resistance
skills.description: Debuff effects reduced by 50%

skills.name: Deep Wounds
skills.description: Aura: Bleed damage on enemies is increased by 40%.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 36)

skills.name: Electric Field
skills.description: When this Monster gets attacked, 50% chance to apply Shock on the attacker.

skills.name: Electrify
skills.description: Every hit has a 10% chance to apply Shock.

skills.name: Electrocute
skills.description: 3 x 100% (300%) magical damage (wind) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 20% chance to apply Shock (Debuff).

skills.name: Encapsulate
skills.description: Heal target for 5 x (40 + 15% Magic) Shield target for 1 x (80% Max Mana)

skills.name: Encapsulate Lvl 2
skills.description: Heal target for 6 x (50 + 20% Magic) Shield target for 1 x (100% Max Mana)

skills.name: Encapsulate Lvl 3
skills.description: Heal target for 7 x (60 + 20% Magic) Shield target for 1 x (120% Max Mana)

skills.name: Encapsulate Lvl 4
skills.description: Heal target for 8 x (70 + 20% Magic) Shield target for 1 x (150% Max Mana)

skills.name: Encapsulate Lvl 5
skills.description: Heal target for 9 x (90 + 20% Magic) Shield target for 1 x (200% Max Mana)

skills.name: Fire Pillar
skills.description: 3 x 200% (600%) magical damage (fire) applies Sorcery, Regeneration & Spellshield (Buffs) to itself

skills.name: Fireball
skills.description: 1 x 230% magical damage (fire)

skills.name: Fireball Lvl 2
skills.description: 1 x 285% magical damage (fire)

skills.name: Fireball Lvl 3
skills.description: 1 x 355% magical damage (fire)

skills.name: Fireball Lvl 4
skills.description: 1 x 435% magical damage (fire)

skills.name: Fireball Lvl 5
skills.description: 1 x 540% magical damage (fire)

skills.name: Forceful Sorcery
skills.description: Unique Aura: Sorcery also makes all attacks ignore 10% of the enemy's overall damage reduction value.

skills.name: Golden Age
skills.description: Aura: Whenever a Monster in the party receives an Age stack, remove a Debuff from it.

skills.name: Healing Link
skills.description: Whenever another Monster in your party is healed, this Monster has a 25% chance to get healed by the same amount.

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 333)

skills.name: Heat Shimmer
skills.description: 3 x 100% (300%) magical damage (fire) applies Glory (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Heat Shimmer Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 95% (380%) magical damage (fire) applies Glory (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Heat Shimmer Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 95% (475%) magical damage (fire) applies Glory (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Improved Mana Regeneration
skills.description: +20% Mana Regeneration

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Magnetize
skills.description: Unique Aura: Shock on enemies causes their attacks to have a 15% chance to be redirected to the Monster in your party with the highest Defense value.

skills.name: Mana Buffer
skills.description: When consuming or losing mana, shield self by 300% of that amount.

skills.name: Mana Conflux
skills.description: Throughout combat, gain a Charge stack for every 75 Mana spent by any allied Monster.

skills.name: Mana Donor
skills.description: Aura: Whenever another Monster in the party would spend Mana, 25% of the needed Mana is taken from this Monster instead.

skills.name: Mana Focus
skills.description: Mana and Mana Regeneration values from equipment increased by 25%.

skills.name: Mana Healing
skills.description: Healing actions trigger an additional Heal on the Monster with the lowest Health equal to 50% of Max Mana value.

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Mana Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 50% of Max Mana.

skills.name: Mana Stability
skills.description: Increase Defense by 15% of this Monster's Max Mana.

skills.name: Multi Sorcery
skills.description: Aura: Sorcery (Buff) can be stacked two additional times. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Neutral Weakness
skills.description: Neutral damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Overcast
skills.description: Increases the Mana Cost of all attacks, healing and shielding actions by 10% and the power by 15%.

skills.name: Phoenix Affinity
skills.description: When this Monster is knocked out for the first time in combat, it is revived with 10% of its Max Health.

skills.name: Revive
skills.description: Revives target Heal target for 5 x (50 + 15% Magic)

skills.name: Revive Lvl 2
skills.description: Revives target Heal target for 6 x (75 + 15% Magic)

skills.name: Revive Lvl 3
skills.description: Revives target Heal target for 6 x (125 + 25% Magic)

skills.name: Sorcerer
skills.description: When exploiting an enemy's weakness with an attack, gain Sorcery (Buff) and shield self by 75% of this monster's Magic value.

skills.name: Static
skills.description: Non-critical hits deal 20% more damage.

skills.name: Stunned
skills.description: Unique Aura: Shock (Debuff) also reduces enemy's Dodge Chance by 10% and their Critical Chance by 7%.

skills.name: Thunderstorm
skills.description: 1 x 160% magical damage (wind) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Shock (Debuff)

skills.name: Thunderstorm Lvl 2
skills.description: 1 x 210% magical damage (wind) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Shock (Debuff)

skills.name: Thunderstorm Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 125% (250%) magical damage (wind) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Shock (Debuff)

skills.name: Transfusion
skills.description: Recover Health equal to 200% the amount of Mana regenerated.

skills.name: Voltage
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) magical damage (wind) Applies Shock (Debuff)

skills.name: Voltage Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) magical damage (wind) Applies Shock (Debuff)

skills.name: Voltage Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 55% (275%) magical damage (wind) Applies Shock (Debuff)

skills.name: Voltage Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 55% (330%) magical damage (wind) Applies Shock (Debuff)

skills.name: Voltage Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 70% (420%) magical damage (wind) Applies Shock (Debuff)

skills.name: Water Resistance
skills.description: Water damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Whirlpool
skills.description: 5 x 70% (350%) magical damage (water) Removes 2 Debuffs from Caster

skills.name: Whirlpool Lvl 2
skills.description: 6 x 70% (420%) magical damage (water) Removes 3 Debuffs from Caster

drops.name: Pirate Hook
drops.description: Crit Chance +5%. Heal self for 250 on the first critical hit of an attack.
